EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Software: The Time for Digital Transformation is Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth at the Gartner Business Intelligence and Analytics Summit this month in Grapevine! With rapid innovation in IoT, data management architecture, and advanced analytics, it’s an exciting time to be asking big questions of your data. At Pivotal, our mission is to transform how the world builds software by helping our clients modernize their data architecture and harness the power of machine learning.
We invite you to take advantage of our library of Big Data and Digital Transformation resources, including:
- Case Study: How O’Reilly Media Uses Pivotal Greenplum for Digital Publishing <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/case-study/enabling-rapid-analysis-of-huge-quantities-of-data-oreilly-media?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=GartnerBIQ116]]> - On-Demand Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016 <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium-text-link&utm_campaign=GartnerBIQ116]]>
To participate in a live discussion about digital transformation, please join us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Gartner-BIQ116]]>, August 1–4. SpringOne Platform brings developers, operators, architects, data scientists and executives together for in-depth, advanced, technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data analytics, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more.
Registration is now open - please join us <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Gartner-BIQ116]]>!
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
